A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great effects\, and full of emotional moments. Sadly\, this don't distracts me from the plot. All the options opened by TFA are completely shut down. I felt the film spit on me\, and my experience as a Star Wars since my childhood. I recommend seeing this once\, just to witness how a good saga dies. I will not watch episode 9\, nor the new saga if this is its future.
